subject: How to test webservices using JUnit?
from: "B. Sai Prasad, M.Phil, SCJP, MCP, MCTS, SSGB, PMP, PMI-SP" <sai.prasad.b@...>
authorName: B. Sai Prasad, M.Phil, SCJP, MCP, MCTS, S
msgSnippet: Hi - I am using JUnit 4.x version for testing all my core business classes, and some of them are exposed as webservices. I would like to test these webservices
messageBody:
Hi -

I am using JUnit 4.x version for testing all my core business classes, and
some of them are exposed as webservices. I would like to test these
webservices using JUnit or its supporting frameworks.

Please suggest
Thanks in advance
Sai
